apatizers.name: Sourdough & Olive Oil
apatizers.description: dip the bread in the oil. You'll love it.

tacos.name: Chicken Tinga
tacos.description: slow-cooked chicken with a flavor that knocks your socks off.

tacos.name: Carnitas
tacos.description: slow-cooked pork in lard with a hint of citrus and thyme. You'll never eat another taco for as long as you live. but if you do, you'll hate yourself.

curry.name: Massaman Curry
curry.description: served warm and simmering with basmati rice and popping-hot cherry tomatos filled with something akin to lava.

curry.name: Kashmiri Potato Curry
curry.description: slow-cooked spicy curry that will warm you all the way to your toes. served with seasonsed yogurt sauce and cilantro.

desserts.name: Tollhouse Cookies
desserts.description: It's the perfect cookie. Don't argue.

drinks.name: Old Rasputin
drinks.description: the greatest beer ever brewed. If it's not your thing, more for me.

drinks.name: Lime Pilsner
drinks.description: light, fresh and delicious. perfect in pairs.
